ps1.2:1.1.pli: Kā diṭṭhi, kati diṭṭhiṭṭhānāni, kati diṭṭhipariyuṭṭhānāni, kati diṭṭhiyo, kati diṭṭhābhinivesā, katamo diṭṭhiṭṭhānasamugghātoti?

ps1.2:8.2.pli: Rūpaṃ etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attāti—

ps1.2:8.7.pli: viññāṇaṃ etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attāti—

ps1.2:8.14.pli: manaṃ etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attāti—

ps1.2:8.21.pli: dhamme etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attāti—

ps1.2:8.28.pli: manoviññāṇaṃ etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attāti—

ps1.2:8.35.pli: manosamphassaṃ etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attāti—

ps1.2:8.42.pli: manosamphassajaṃ vedanaṃ etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attāti—

ps1.2:9.6.pli: dhammasaññaṃ etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attāti—

ps1.2:9.13.pli: dhammasañcetanaṃ etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attāti—

ps1.2:9.20.pli: dhammataṇhaṃ etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attāti—

ps1.2:9.27.pli: dhammavitakkaṃ etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attāti—

ps1.2:9.34.pli: dhammavicāraṃ etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attāti—

ps1.2:10.6.pli: viññāṇadhātuṃ etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attāti—

ps1.2:10.17.pli: viññāṇakasiṇaṃ etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attāti—

ps1.2:11.32.pli: matthaluṅgaṃ etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attāti—

ps1.2:13.18.pli: manoviññāṇadhātuṃ etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attāti—

ps1.2:14.19.pli: paññindriyaṃ etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attāti—

ps1.2:15.24.pli: nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattiṃ etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attāti—

ps1.2:16.12.pli: jarāmaraṇaṃ etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attāti—

ps1.2:17.2.pli: Khandhāpi diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ, avijjāpi diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ, phassopi diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ, saññāpi diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ, vitakkopi diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ, ayoniso manasikāropi diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ, pāpamittopi diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ, paratoghosopi diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ.

ps1.2:18.1.pli: Khandhā hetu khandhā paccayo diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ upādāya samuṭṭhānaṭṭhena—

ps1.2:19.1.pli: Avijjā hetu avijjā paccayo diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ upādāya samuṭṭhānaṭṭhena—

ps1.2:20.1.pli: Phasso hetu phasso paccayo diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ upādāya samuṭṭhānaṭṭhena—

ps1.2:21.1.pli: Saññā hetu saññā paccayo diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ upādāya samuṭṭhānaṭṭhena—

ps1.2:22.1.pli: Vitakko hetu vitakko paccayo diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ upādāya, samuṭṭhānaṭṭhena—

ps1.2:23.1.pli: Ayoniso manasikāro hetu ayoniso manasikāro paccayo diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ upādāya samuṭṭhānaṭṭhena—

ps1.2:24.1.pli: Pāpamitto hetu pāpamitto paccayo diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ upādāya, samuṭṭhānaṭṭhena—

ps1.2:25.1.pli: Paratoghoso hetu paratoghoso paccayo diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ upādāya samuṭṭhānaṭṭhena—

ps1.2:26.2.pli: Yā diṭṭhi diṭṭhigataṃ, diṭṭhigahanaṃ, diṭṭhikantāraṃ, diṭṭhivisūkaṃ, diṭṭhivipphanditaṃ, diṭṭhisaññojanaṃ, diṭṭhisallaṃ, diṭṭhisambādho, diṭṭhipalibodho, diṭṭhibandhanaṃ, diṭṭhipapāto, diṭṭhānusayo, diṭṭhisantāpo, diṭṭhipariḷāho, diṭṭhigantho, diṭṭhupādānaṃ, diṭṭhābhiniveso, diṭṭhiparāmāso—

ps1.2:27.2.pli: Assādadiṭṭhi, attānudiṭṭhi, micchādiṭṭhi, sakkāyadiṭṭhi, sakkāyavatthukā sassatadiṭṭhi, sakkāyavatthukā ucchedadiṭṭhi, antaggāhikā diṭṭhi, pubbantānudiṭṭhi, aparantānudiṭṭhi, saññojanikā diṭṭhi, ahanti mānavinibandhā diṭṭhi, mamanti mānavinibandhā diṭṭhi, attavādapaṭisaṃyuttā diṭṭhi, lokavādapaṭisaṃyuttā diṭṭhi, bhavadiṭṭhi, vibhavadiṭṭhi—

ps1.2:28.12.pli: Ahanti mānavinibandhāya diṭṭhiyā katihākārehi abhiniveso hoti?

ps1.2:28.13.pli: Mamanti mānavinibandhāya diṭṭhiyā katihākārehi abhiniveso hoti?

ps1.2:29.5.pli: Sakkāyavatthukāya sassatadiṭṭhiyā pannarasahi ākārehi abhiniveso hoti.

ps1.2:29.7.pli: Antaggāhikāya diṭṭhiyā paññāsāya ākārehi abhiniveso hoti.

ps1.2:29.10.pli: Saññojanikāya diṭṭhiyā aṭṭhārasahi ākārehi abhiniveso hoti.

ps1.2:29.11.pli: Ahanti mānavinibandhāya diṭṭhiyā aṭṭhārasahi ākārehi abhiniveso hoti.

ps1.2:29.12.pli: Mamanti mānavinibandhāya diṭṭhiyā aṭṭhārasahi ākārehi abhiniveso hoti.

ps1.2:29.13.pli: Attavādapaṭisaṃyuttāya diṭṭhiyā vīsatiyā ākārehi abhiniveso hoti.

ps1.2:29.14.pli: Lokavādapaṭisaṃyuttāya diṭṭhiyā aṭṭhahi ākārehi abhiniveso hoti.

ps1.2:30.1.pli: Assādadiṭṭhiyā katamehi pañcatiṃsāya ākārehi abhiniveso hoti?

ps1.2:30.2.pli: Yaṃ rūpaṃ paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṃ somanassaṃ, ayaṃ rūpassa assādoti—

ps1.2:30.4.pli: Diṭṭhi na assādo, assādo na diṭṭhi.

ps1.2:30.6.pli: Yā ca diṭṭhi yo ca assādo—

ps1.2:31.3.pli: Diṭṭhivipanno puggalo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupāsitabbo.

ps1.2:31.6.pli: Yo diṭṭhiyā rāgo, so na diṭṭhi.

ps1.2:31.9.pli: Yā ca diṭṭhi yo ca rāgo—

ps1.2:31.11.pli: Tāya ca diṭṭhiyā tena ca rāgena samannāgato puggalo diṭṭhirāgaratto.

ps1.2:31.12.pli: Diṭṭhirāgaratte puggale dinnaṃ dānaṃ na mahapphalaṃ hoti na mahānisaṃsaṃ.

ps1.2:32.3.pli: Micchādiṭṭhikassa purisapuggalassa yañceva kāyakammaṃ yathādiṭṭhi samattaṃ samādinnaṃ, yañca vacīkammaṃ …pe…

ps1.2:32.4.pli: yañca manokammaṃ yathādiṭṭhi samattaṃ samādinnaṃ, yā ca cetanā yā ca patthanā yo ca paṇidhi ye ca saṅkhārā, sabbe te dhammā aniṭṭhāya akantāya amanāpāya ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattanti.

ps1.2:32.7.pli: Seyyathāpi nimbabījaṃ vā kosātakībījaṃ vā tittakālābubījaṃ vā allāya pathaviyā nikkhittaṃ yaṃ ceva pathavirasaṃ upādiyati, yañca āporasaṃ upādiyati, sabbaṃ taṃ tittakattāya kaṭukattāya asātattāya saṃvattati.

ps1.2:32.10.pli: Evamevaṃ micchādiṭṭhikassa purisapuggalassa yañceva kāyakammaṃ yathādiṭṭhi samattaṃ samādinnaṃ, yañca vacīkammaṃ …pe…

ps1.2:32.11.pli: yañca manokammaṃ yathādiṭṭhi samattaṃ samādinnaṃ, yā ca cetanā yā ca patthanā yo ca paṇidhi ye ca saṅkhārā, sabbe te dhammā aniṭṭhāya akantāya amanāpāya ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattanti.

ps1.2:33.1.pli: Micchādiṭṭhi diṭṭhigataṃ, diṭṭhigahanaṃ, diṭṭhikantāraṃ, diṭṭhivisūkaṃ, diṭṭhivipphanditaṃ, diṭṭhisaññojanaṃ, diṭṭhisallaṃ, diṭṭhisambādho, diṭṭhipalibodho, diṭṭhibandhanaṃ, diṭṭhipapāto, diṭṭhānusayo, diṭṭhisantāpo, diṭṭhipariḷāho, diṭṭhigantho, diṭṭhupādānaṃ, diṭṭhābhiniveso, diṭṭhiparāmāso—

ps1.2:34.1.pli: Atthi saññojanāni ceva diṭṭhiyo ca, atthi saññojanāni na ca diṭṭhiyo.

ps1.2:36.2.pli: Kāmarāgasaññojanaṃ, paṭighasaññojanaṃ, mānasaññojanaṃ, vicikicchāsaññojanaṃ, bhavarāgasaññojanaṃ, issāsaññojanaṃ, macchariyasaññojanaṃ, anunayasaññojanaṃ, avijjāsaññojanaṃ—

ps1.2:37.34.pli: yaṃ manosamphassajaṃ vedanaṃ paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṃ somanassaṃ, ayaṃ manosamphassajāya vedanāya assādoti—

ps1.2:37.36.pli: Diṭṭhi na assādo, assādo na diṭṭhi.

ps1.2:37.38.pli: Yā ca diṭṭhi yo ca assādo—

ps1.2:38.3.pli: Diṭṭhivipanno puggalo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupāsitabbo.

ps1.2:38.6.pli: Yo diṭṭhiyā rāgo, so na diṭṭhi.

ps1.2:38.9.pli: Yā ca diṭṭhi yo ca rāgo, ayaṃ vuccati diṭṭhirāgo.

ps1.2:38.10.pli: Tāya ca diṭṭhiyā tena ca rāgena samannāgato puggalo diṭṭhirāgaratto.

ps1.2:38.11.pli: Diṭṭhirāgaratte puggale dinnaṃ dānaṃ na mahapphalaṃ hoti na mahānisaṃsaṃ.

ps1.2:39.3.pli: Micchādiṭṭhikassa purisapuggalassa yañceva kāyakammaṃ yathādiṭṭhi samattaṃ samādinnaṃ, yañca vacīkammaṃ …pe…

ps1.2:39.4.pli: yañca manokammaṃ yathādiṭṭhi samattaṃ samādinnaṃ, yā ca cetanā yā ca patthanā yo ca paṇidhi ye ca saṅkhārā, sabbe te dhammā aniṭṭhāya akantāya amanāpāya ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattanti.

ps1.2:39.7.pli: Seyyathāpi nimbabījaṃ vā kosātakībījaṃ vā tittakālābubījaṃ vā allāya pathaviyā nikkhittaṃ yañceva pathavirasaṃ upādiyati yañca āporasaṃ upādiyati, sabbaṃ taṃ tittakattāya kaṭukattāya asātattāya saṃvattati.

ps1.2:39.10.pli: Evamevaṃ micchādiṭṭhikassa purisapuggalassa yañceva kāyakammaṃ yathādiṭṭhi samattaṃ samādinnaṃ yañca vacīkammaṃ …pe…

ps1.2:39.11.pli: yañca manokammaṃ yathādiṭṭhi samattaṃ samādinnaṃ, yā ca cetanā yā ca patthanā yo ca paṇidhi ye ca saṅkhārā, sabbe te dhammā aniṭṭhāya akantāya amanāpāya ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattanti.

ps1.2:41.1.pli: Atthi saññojanāni ceva diṭṭhiyo ca, atthi saññojanāni na ca diṭṭhiyo.

ps1.2:41.6.pli: Kāmarāgasaññojanaṃ, paṭighasaññojanaṃ, mānasaññojanaṃ, vicikicchāsaññojanaṃ, bhavarāgasaññojanaṃ, issāsaññojanaṃ, macchariyasaññojanaṃ, anunayasaññojanaṃ, avijjāsaññojanaṃ—

ps1.2:41.8.pli: Assādadiṭṭhiyā imehi pañcatiṃsāya ākārehi abhiniveso hoti.

ps1.2:42.1.pli: Attānudiṭṭhiyā katamehi vīsatiyā ākārehi abhiniveso hoti?

ps1.2:42.2.pli: Idha assutavā puthujjano ariyānaṃ adassāvī ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme avinīto, sappurisānaṃ adassāvī sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme avinīto rūpaṃ attato samanupassati rūpavantaṃ vā attānaṃ attani vā rūpaṃ rūpasmiṃ vā attānaṃ;

ps1.2:42.6.pli: viññāṇaṃ attato samanupassati viññāṇavantaṃ vā attānaṃ attani vā viññāṇaṃ viññāṇasmiṃ vā attānaṃ.

ps1.2:43.6.pli: Seyyathāpi telappadīpassa jhāyato “yā acci so vaṇṇo, yo vaṇṇo sā accī”ti—

ps1.2:43.13.pli: Diṭṭhi na vatthu, vatthu na diṭṭhi.

ps1.2:44.11.pli: Seyyathāpi telappadīpassa jhāyato “yā acci, so vaṇṇo;

ps1.2:44.17.pli: Diṭṭhi na vatthu, vatthu na diṭṭhi.

ps1.2:45.8.pli: So kho pana me ayaṃ attā iminā rūpena rūpavā”ti.

ps1.2:45.14.pli: So kho panāyaṃ rukkho imāya chāyāya chāyāvā”ti.

ps1.2:45.22.pli: So kho pana ayaṃ attā iminā rūpena rūpavā”ti.

ps1.2:45.25.pli: Diṭṭhi na vatthu, vatthu na diṭṭhi.

ps1.2:46.14.pli: So kho panāyaṃ gandho imasmiṃ pupphe”ti.

ps1.2:46.25.pli: Diṭṭhi na vatthu, vatthu na diṭṭhi.

ps1.2:47.8.pli: So kho pana me ayaṃ attā imasmiṃ rūpe”ti.

ps1.2:47.14.pli: So kho panāyaṃ maṇi imasmiṃ karaṇḍake”ti.

ps1.2:47.22.pli: So kho pana me ayaṃ attā imasmiṃ rūpe”ti.

ps1.2:47.25.pli: Diṭṭhi na vatthu, vatthu na diṭṭhi.

ps1.2:48.2.pli: Idhekacco cakkhusamphassajaṃ vedanaṃ sotasamphassajaṃ vedanaṃ ghānasamphassajaṃ vedanaṃ jivhāsamphassajaṃ vedanaṃ kāyasamphassajaṃ vedanaṃ manosamphassajaṃ vedanaṃ attato samanupassati.

ps1.2:48.3.pli: “Yā manosamphassajā vedanā so ahaṃ, yo ahaṃ sā manosamphassajā vedanā”ti—

ps1.2:48.5.pli: Seyyathāpi telappadīpassa jhāyato “yā acci so vaṇṇo, yo vaṇṇo sā accī”ti—

ps1.2:48.7.pli: Evamevaṃ idhekacco manosamphassajaṃ vedanaṃ attato samanupassati.

ps1.2:48.8.pli: “Yā manosamphassajā vedanā so ahaṃ, yo ahaṃ sā manosamphassajā vedanā”ti—

ps1.2:49.8.pli: So kho pana me ayaṃ attā imāya vedanāya vedanāvā”ti.

ps1.2:49.14.pli: So kho panāyaṃ rukkho imāya chāyāya chāyāvā”ti.

ps1.2:49.22.pli: So kho pana me ayaṃ attā imāya vedanāya vedanāvā”ti.

ps1.2:49.25.pli: Diṭṭhi na vatthu, vatthu na diṭṭhi.

ps1.2:50.14.pli: So kho panāyaṃ gandho imasmiṃ pupphe”ti.

ps1.2:50.25.pli: Diṭṭhi na vatthu, vatthu na diṭṭhi.

ps1.2:51.8.pli: So kho pana me ayaṃ attā imāya vedanāyā”ti.

ps1.2:51.14.pli: So kho panāyaṃ maṇi imasmiṃ karaṇḍake”ti.

ps1.2:51.22.pli: So kho pana me ayaṃ attā imāya vedanāyā”ti.

ps1.2:51.25.pli: Diṭṭhi na vatthu, vatthu na diṭṭhi.

ps1.2:52.8.pli: “Yā manosamphassajā saññā so ahaṃ, yo ahaṃ sā manosamphassajā saññā”ti—

ps1.2:52.10.pli: Seyyathāpi telappadīpassa jhāyato “yā acci so vaṇṇo, yo vaṇṇo sā accī”ti—

ps1.2:52.12.pli: Evamevaṃ idhekacco manosamphassajaṃ saññaṃ attato samanupassati.

ps1.2:52.13.pli: “Yā manosamphassajā saññā so ahaṃ, yo ahaṃ sā manosamphassajā saññā”ti.

ps1.2:52.16.pli: Diṭṭhi na vatthu, vatthu na diṭṭhi.

ps1.2:53.8.pli: So kho pana me ayaṃ attā imāya saññāya saññāvā”ti.

ps1.2:53.14.pli: So kho panāyaṃ rukkho imāya chāyāya chāyāvā”ti.

ps1.2:53.22.pli: So kho pana me ayaṃ attā imāya saññāya saññāvā”ti.

ps1.2:53.25.pli: Diṭṭhi na vatthu, vatthu na diṭṭhi.

ps1.2:54.14.pli: So kho panāyaṃ gandho imasmiṃ pupphe”ti.

ps1.2:54.25.pli: Diṭṭhi na vatthu, vatthu na diṭṭhi.

ps1.2:55.8.pli: So kho pana me ayaṃ attā imāya saññāyā”ti.

ps1.2:55.14.pli: So kho panāyaṃ maṇi imasmiṃ karaṇḍake”ti.

ps1.2:55.22.pli: So kho pana me ayaṃ attā imāya saññāyā”ti.

ps1.2:55.25.pli: Diṭṭhi na vatthu, vatthu na diṭṭhi.

ps1.2:56.6.pli: Seyyathāpi telappadīpassa jhāyato “yā acci so vaṇṇo, yo vaṇṇo sā accī”ti—

ps1.2:56.9.pli: “Yā manosamphassajā cetanā so ahaṃ, yo ahaṃ sā manosamphassajā cetanā”ti—

ps1.2:56.12.pli: Diṭṭhi na vatthu, vatthu na diṭṭhi.

ps1.2:59.22.pli: So kho pana me ayaṃ attā imesu saṅkhāresū”ti.

ps1.2:59.25.pli: Diṭṭhi na vatthu, vatthu na diṭṭhi.

ps1.2:60.17.pli: Diṭṭhi na vatthu, vatthu na diṭṭhi.

ps1.2:123.1.pli: “Ye keci, bhikkhave, mayi niṭṭhaṃ gatā, sabbe te diṭṭhisampannā.

ps1.2:123.2.pli: Tesaṃ diṭṭhisampannānaṃ pañcannaṃ idha niṭṭhā, pañcannaṃ idha vihāya niṭṭhā.

ps1.2:123.4.pli: Sattakkhattuparamassa, kolaṅkolassa, ekabījissa, sakadāgāmissa, yo ca diṭṭheva dhamme arahā—

ps1.2:124.2.pli: Antarāparinibbāyissa, upahaccaparinibbāyissa, asaṅkhāraparinibbāyissa, sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyissa, uddhaṃsotassa, akaniṭṭhagāmino—

ps1.2:125.1.pli: Ye keci, bhikkhave, mayi niṭṭhaṃ gatā, sabbe te diṭṭhisampannā.

ps1.2:125.2.pli: Tesaṃ diṭṭhisampannānaṃ imesaṃ pañcannaṃ idha niṭṭhā, imesaṃ pañcannaṃ idha vihāya niṭṭhā.

ps1.2:126.1.pli: Ye keci, bhikkhave, mayi aveccappasannā, sabbe te sotāpannā.

ps1.2:126.2.pli: Tesaṃ sotāpannānaṃ pañcannaṃ idha niṭṭhā, pañcannaṃ idha vihāya niṭṭhā.

ps1.2:126.4.pli: Sattakkhattuparamassa, kolaṅkolassa, ekabījissa, sakadāgāmissa, yo ca diṭṭheva dhamme arahā—

ps1.2:127.2.pli: Antarāparinibbāyissa, upahaccaparinibbāyissa, asaṅkhāraparinibbāyissa, sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyissa, uddhaṃsotassa, akaniṭṭhagāmino—

ps1.2:128.1.pli: Ye keci, bhikkhave, mayi aveccappasannā, sabbe te sotāpannā.

ps1.2:128.2.pli: Tesaṃ sotāpannānaṃ imesaṃ pañcannaṃ idha niṭṭhā.
